summary: After the death of her father, Hannah becomes concerned with the strange behavior of her mother. As her mother's troubled childhood is revealed, Hannah realizes how little she ever knew.
cast: Katja Riemann|Maria Schrader|Doris Schade|Jutta Lampe|Svea Lohde|Jürgen Vogel|Martin Feifel|Fedja van Huêt|Carola Regnier|Plien van Bennekom|Romijn Conen|Julia Eggert|Thekla Reuten|Jutta Wachowiak|Jan Decleir|Lena Stolze|Edwin de Vries|Carine Crutzen|Lilian Schiffer|Sarah Nemitz|Rainer Strecker|Peter Ender|Roland Silbernagl|Katalin Zsigmondy|Hans Peter Hallwachs|Gaby Dohm|Isolde Barth|Fritz Lichtenhahn|Nina Kunzendorf|Martin Wuttke|Hans Kremer|Wolfgang Pregler|Claudia Rieschel|Siemen Rühaak|Burkhard Schmeer|Heio von Stetten|Carl Achleitner|Frank Behnke|Harald Burmeister|Stacey Denham|Robert Dölle|Lars-Kilian Falk|Uwe Fischer|Monika Häckermann|Ben Kropp|Jean-Pierre Le Roy|Felix Moeller|Morris Perry|Heinz Rilling|Johannes Schäfer|Atto Suttarp|Cynthia Utterbach|Britta Jakobi|Hannelore Koch|Yvette Richter|Christine Schuster|Renate Usko|Susanne Frommert|Cécile Gujer|Jochen Striebeck|Björn Wenner
title: Rosenstrasse
